hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" == *.qmd ]]; then echo '[REMINDER] Documentation modified. Run: cd docs/hirt-whitepaper && quarto render'; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" == *.scad ]]; then echo '[REMINDER] CAD file modified. Export STL when ready: openscad -o output.stl file.scad'; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" == *.claude/memory-bank/* ]]; then echo '[BLOCKED] Memory bank is protected. Use /memory:save to add new entries.' && exit 1; fi
